content: pumpkin spice latte jenny church using 3mm needles throughout co cid 431 ee cast on 8 stitches in peachy colour 1 p 8 2 kfbx8 16 3 p 16 4 kfb k1 x 8 24 5 7 p 24 8 -26 stocking stitch 24 27-29 p 24 30 k2tog k1 x 8 16 31 p 16 32 k2tog x8 8 33 purl 8 b&t sleeve cast on 30 in light brown seed stitch 8 row cast o cid 431 pumpkin cast on 10 in orange stocking stitch 6 row b&t cream using cream yarn french knit 70-80cm length i used french knitting dolly these are available on amazon and at hobby shops legs cast on 8 stitches in brown k8 8 p8 8 k2tog x4 4 p2togx2 2 k2 2 p2 2 cast o cid 431 making up co cid 431 ee - gather cast on stitches to create circular bottom and cast o cid 431 stitches create circular top sew all seams leaving space for stu cid 431 ing sleeve - position onto co cid 431 ee and sew in place sew together row ends may need to leave these open if adding safety eyes so do this after completing face stu cid 431 co cid 431 ee add face using safety eyes size 5mm or embroidery and sew up all gaps left for stu cid 431 ing cream swirl french knitting to create cream shape sewing in place as you go pumpkin using b&t wool sew up row ends add little bit of stu cid 431 ing and then gather cast on stitches to close using this yarn sew around pumpkin to create shape embroider on little green stem and face legs draw through the cast on stitches with cast on yarn and then sew up row ends abbreviations k knit p-purl kfb-knit front and back k2tog knit two together p2tog-purl two together b&t break yarn and pull through stitches to bind o cid 431 seed stitch row 1 k1 p1 repeat row 2 p1 k1 repeat stocking stitch k whole row then purl next row and repeat
